bug.author: PeterParkerLogic
bug.summary: Error at startup: VehicleSetting for vehicle name BP_FlyingPawn_5 was requested but not found
bug.description:
I followed the tutorial ( 9:27 in <denchmark-link:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1oY8Qu5maQQ&feature=youtu.be>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1oY8Qu5maQQ&feature=youtu.be</denchmark-link> ) to create a drone by myself. But it turned out "Error at startup: VehicleSetting for vehicle name BP_FlyingPawn_5 was requested but not found". I followed the method below, but it still not works. <denchmark-link:https://www.gitmemory.com/issue/Microsoft/AirSim/1506/489733160>https://www.gitmemory.com/issue/Microsoft/AirSim/1506/489733160</denchmark-link>
Please help me, Thanks

comments.comment: Hi! Do you get that error when tapping on play? My problem with that video is that I don't see that parameters on my Details menu
Yes, I got this error, "VehicleSetting for vehicle name BP_FlyingPawn_5 was requested but not found", when I tapped on play.
I confirm this is happening on master (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/AirSim/commit/d59ceb7f63878f5e087ea802d603ba0fd282ff56>d59ceb7</denchmark-link> )
